jcr:content.jcr:title: Adobe RoboHelp
jcr:content.metaDescription: Follow these instructions to install your trial of Adobe RoboHelp

text_4a1c.text:
Adobe RoboHelp will download now...
Thank you for registering for the 30-day trial, your download will now begin. Unzip the downloaded file and run 'Set-up.exe' to install RoboHelp.
Your 30-day trial will begin from the day you install the product.
To download the Mac version of the latest release of RoboHelp, click here.

text_4420.text: Get free Enterprise support with your RoboHelp trial

text_e9.text: Schedule a demo with our experts for a guided tour of RoboHelp

text_36f7.text: Get the most out of Adobe RoboHelp

text_e6d6.text: Get started with Adobe RoboHelp

text_aa20.text: Learn about the new user interface and features so you can create amazing Help content for customers.

image_5088.alt: Explore the advanced features in Adobe RoboHelp

text_17fa.text: Explore the advanced features in Adobe RoboHelp

text_6949.text: See how you can upgrade projects, work smarter with the new minimalist interface, collaborate with source control solutions like GIT, author micro content and more.

text_d3d6.text:
Introduction to Adobe RoboHelp
Quickly get started with Adobe RoboHelp with this free online course
containing 3 hours of tutorial videos.
